#Events

## Overview
|Action|Event|No. of notes affected
|---|---|---|
|User opens obsidian| `layout-ready` | N (All notes with `oe_sync: true`) |
|User presses `Ctrl+s` | `editor:save-file` | 1 (Active note) |
|User editor note|`modify`| 1 (Note that was edited) |
|User renames note| `rename` |  1 (Note that was renamed) |
